v-model.description: Select the value, which is a 13-bit timestamp or an array of timestamps
v-model.description_zh: 选中值，为 13 位时间戳或时间戳数组

type.type: date / dates / datetime / week / month / daterange / datetimerange / weekrange / monthrange

min-date.value: 当前日期往前推 6 个月
min-date.description: The smallest date, which is a 13-bit timestamp
min-date.description_zh: 最小日期，为 13 位时间戳

max-date.value: 当前日期往后推 6 个月
max-date.description: The largest date, which is a 13-bit timestamp
max-date.description_zh: 最大日期，为 13 位时间戳

first-day-of-week.description: The day of the week starts

max-range.description: type is valid when the range is selected, and the maximum date range is selected
max-range.description_zh: type 为范围选择时有效，最大日期范围

range-prompt.value: 选择天数不能超过 x 天
range-prompt.description: type is valid when the range is selected, and the error message is selected when the maximum date range is selected
range-prompt.description_zh: type 为范围选择时有效，选择超出最大日期范围时的错误提示文案

allow-same-day.description: Type is valid when the range is selected, and whether the same day is allowed
allow-same-day.description_zh: type 为范围选择时有效，是否允许选择同一天

default-time.description: The specific time of the day used for the selected date
default-time.description_zh: 选中日期所使用的当日内具体时刻

time-filter.description: Valid when type is 'datetime' or 'datetimerange' and is used to filter the data for the time selector
time-filter.description_zh: type 为 'datetime' 或 'datetimerange' 时有效，用于过滤时间选择器的数据

hide-second.description: If the type is set to 'datetime' or 'datetimerange', whether the second modification is not displayed
hide-second.description_zh: type 为 'datetime' 或 'datetimerange' 时有效，是否不展示秒修改

show-confirm.description: Whether or not to display the OK button

show-type-switch.description: Whether to display the type switching function
show-type-switch.description_zh: 是否显示类型切换功能

shortcuts.description: Shortcut option for an array of objects, where the text of the object must be passed
shortcuts.description_zh: 快捷选项，为对象数组，其中对象的 text 必传

display-format.description: Customize the formatting function of the display copy, which returns a string
display-format.description_zh: 自定义展示文案的格式化函数，返回一个字符串

inner-display-format.description: Customize the internal echo of the panel of the range selection type, returning a string
inner-display-format.description_zh: 自定义范围选择类型的面板内部回显，返回一个字符串

label-width.description: Set the width of the header on the left

error.description: Whether it is in the error state, and the content on the right side is red when the error state is in the error state
error.description_zh: 是否为错误状态，错误状态时右侧内容为红色

center.description: Whether or not it is vertically centered

ellipsis.description: Whether or not it is out of hiding

align-right.description: The value of the selector is shown on the right

before-confirm.description: Before determining the checksum function, the { value, resolve } parameter is received, and the execution is continued by resolve, and the resolve receives 1 boolean parameter
before-confirm.description_zh: 确定前校验函数，接收 { value, resolve } 参数，通过 resolve 继续执行，resolve 接收 1 个 boolean 参数

use-default-slot.description: Set this option when using the default slot
use-default-slot.description_zh: 使用默认插槽时设置该选项

use-label-slot.description: Set this option when using the label slot
use-label-slot.description_zh: 使用 label 插槽时设置该选项

close-on-click-modal.description: Click whether the mask is off

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether the pop-up panel sets the bottom safety distance (iPhone X type models)
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 弹出面板是否设置底部安全距离（iphone X 类型的机型）

prop.description: The form field model field name, which is required if the form validation function is used
prop.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段名，在使用表单校验功能的情况下，该属性是必填的

rules.description: Form validation rules, which can be used in conjunction with the wd-form component
rules.description_zh: 表单验证规则，结合wd-form组件使用

immediate-change.description: If the type is 'datetime' or 'datetimerange', whether the picker-view change event is triggered immediately when the finger is released. If it is not enabled, the change event will be triggered after the end of the scrolling animation, which is available from version 1.2.25 onwards and is only supported by WeChat Mini Programs and Alipay Mini Programs.
immediate-change.description_zh: type 为 'datetime' 或 'datetimerange' 时有，是否在手指松开时立即触发picker-view的 change 事件。若不开启则会在滚动动画结束后触发 change 事件，1.2.25版本起提供，仅微信小程序和支付宝小程序支持。

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the binding value changes

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when you click on the panel date

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the close button or masked is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击关闭按钮或者蒙层时触发

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the calendar is opened
